attributes.action: revoke the disastrous fiscal policies of the previous Brown administration.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister Cameron

Please avoid the easy route in your first year in office and have the courage to roll back the petty, class hatred-ridden tinkering that Brown and Darling wallowed in during their last eighteen months.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
